extendedInfo.description: SlideIT Custom Skin app allows you to customize your favorite keyboard to your taste.With this new app, you can now change the look of your keyboard in almost any way you can imagine.Choose the background, select the icon set, set the colors, and pick a name for your new skin. It's that simple!Features include:Background - Choose from any color or picture on your device. You can even capture directly from the camera!Icons - Select from any of the preinstalled icon sets.Color Scheme - Change the color scheme of the icon set to match your background.Fine-tune - Change individual colors and settings such as line width.Name it - Give that cool gorgeous skin a great name!Dasur Ltd skin addon skin.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I get my skin all made but then when I try to apply it, it just says skin not applied. The custom skin application is famed damaged.  Would be a great idea but there is something broken in it. I see others have the same issue.
reviews.author: Glenn S

reviews.title: Nice!  Great customer support!
reviews.comment: Was having a problem where it wouldn\'t apply the skin to the keyboard.  Emailed customer service, and received a reply within a couple of hours!
reviews.author: Will Davis

reviews.title: good start
reviews.comment: Needs to be able to choose from more templates, or modify existing skins. 4 templates is just too few. We need to be able to save at least ten Custom Skins. The ability to share skins (perhaps on a cloud service?)   would also make this a better App. Until then, this is a 3 Star App.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This is awesome, you can use your own pic, graphic or a just a color, you can customize every aspect! Did I mention it\'s awesome?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slide it keyboard
reviews.comment: This sucks do not download it said I needed to download the full Version to use it and I Just downloaded it and it was suppose to give me a free demo but it didnt work I would have gave it a 0 but it wouldn\'t let me!
reviews.author: Caylin Bouler

reviews.title: Custom key backdrop.
reviews.comment: loads of fun and easy to use. does anyone know if there is a way to download or use only keyboard backdrops (the style of the keys minus background preset) from other pre-customized skins?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love i takes some practice. Fun to make new skins.
reviews.comment: A bit had to  read  suggested words as they are very  small.
reviews.author: Lorri Yule

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Makes the keyboard fun and bright love that I can set a picture to my background nice touch
reviews.author: Brittany Lee

reviews.title: I Love It
reviews.comment: Its great. I uploaded my skin to Google Play npw can some1 tell me how to adjust the Height, Keys & Fonts & I\'ll be good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: whats goin\' on here?
reviews.comment: was 1 of my favs but installed on 2 GS2 & I can\'t get it to work. please! please! work!!! I will rerate if I can get it 2 work again. I miss it!!! :-\\
reviews.author: Gina Denham

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Its a nice keyboard but i cant apply my own skin it says the app is damaged?
reviews.author: Casey Simpson

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: Cool concept but isn\'t working waiting on Dev to email me back with a fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So much fun and way cool!
reviews.comment: Love making brand new keyboard skin\'s for every mood I am feeling. I\'m so happy and so greatful to SlideIT for making this such a fun experience for me. SlideIT ROCKS BIG TIME!
reviews.author: Cathy Lindsey

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This app is the perfect solution to anyone (like me) that just can\'t seem to find a keyboard \"skin\" that\'s ~right~.    Now, I can design it ~my~ way!          ** Great app devs, keep up the great work!! Only opinion I have is, possibly adding more options to play with (if its even possible since this app currently has enough).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it...
reviews.comment: But it does lag sometimes. Still worth 5 stars though. Being able to have a Ouija board for a keyboard background is just too awesome not to give it that.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix this
reviews.comment: spent maybe an hour coming up with this perfect skin and then it says \"skin damaged\" or some crap like that.   I can\'t even get the ready made skins because it says skins invalid, even after i upgraded to version 5 from version 4. If this could be fixed, it would be an easy 5 star. I love it more than swype.
reviews.author: Nico Strachan

reviews.title: Damaged
reviews.comment: On Galaxy Note 2.  Can save skin but can\'t apply it.  Have paid version of Slide It. Says the app is damaged. Hope this gets fixed.  Cool app overall.  I love customizing everything.
reviews.author: Grim Reaper

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: I emailed them with a problem I was having and it was fixed just like that nice app
reviews.author: A Google User
